WorkItem.Description:
I can't access the Manage Catalog Subscriptions as it appears to be greyed out. I've restarted the application and even rebooted the server with no luck. Any suggestions?

![Image](http://i.imgur.com/qMl1h5J.png)

Comments.Message: Did you select one or more catalogs for subscriptions? If not, select first over Import from Catalog one or more Catalogs.

That's not how I selected them the first time. I went to manage catalog subscriptions and just added them there. I did import them as you suggested so I could get the latest flash player, but it is still greyed out. I guess since I only have two, I can live with doing it this way.
Afair This happens when wpp is trying to check for updates (catalog and program). Afterwards you should be able to manage the subscriptions.
That's right. You can't manage catalog while WPP check for new version of these catalog.
